Recipe.Description: Dried flakes of tomato skin for garnishes.

Prerequisites.Prerequisite: Food dehydrator, or oven or air fryer with dehydrator function, preheated to 135F.

Method.Step: Lay the tomato skins on dehydrator sheets and dehydrate them at 135 degrees F for 8-12 hours until they become brittle and lose all moisture.
Transfer the dried skins to a coffee grinder and process them until you have flakes of tomato skin. Store the confetti in an airtight jar.
